c1.name: Thundering Might
c1.effect: Recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

c2.name: Keen Extraction
c2.effect: When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit enemies affected by Electro, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

c3.name: Foreseen Reformation
c3.effect: Increases the level of Starward Sword by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Attunement
c4.effect: For 10s after Keqing triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, her ATK is increased by 25%.

c5.name: Beckoning Stars
c5.effect: Increases the level of Stellar Restoration by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Tenacious Star
c6.effect: When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% Electro DMG Bonus for 8s. Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.
